explanation: Multiple participants expressed bullish sentiment, expecting BTC to break all-time highs and reach levels like $120k. There is mention of millions being invested to pump BTC, several users stating 'only up', 'soooo bullish', and others confirming adding to longs or holding. No strong or repeated counter-opinions to this upward trend were present. Some traders noted technical support and positive signals like EMA curling up, supporting a bullish short-term view.
representative_opinions: LORD UZI: millions of dollars have been invested into the market to pump this time btc is going to break the all time high
Neev: agree ruslanas i might add to my long
Solidity Monster: why would anyone short right now? Silly comment.
Noob Trader: smaller ema's curling up
Neev: yessir glad i held onto this long
